column2: "Nna Abimelek
column3: Jerubaal ne babanyin no sii mu kɔr Sekem ne na no nuanom nkyɛn
column4: na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn
column5: na ne na n'egya fie ebusua nyinara dɛ
column8: hom nkasa wɔ Sekemmba nyinara asomu dɛ
column9: Dza ɔwɔ hen na oye ma hom
column10: dɛ Jerubaal mbabanyin nyinara a wɔyɛ nyimpa eduosuon no bedzi hom do hen
column11: anaa dɛ kor bedzi hom do hen? Eso hom nkaa dɛ meyɛ hom biew na hom honam."

column2: "Na ne na no nuanom no kaa no ho nsɛm yi nyinara wɔ Sekemmba no asomu: na hɔn akoma danee kedzii Abimelek ekyir: na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hɛn nua a."

column2: "Na woyii Baal-berit fie ndwetɛbona eduosuon dze maa no
column3: na Abimelek dze bɔɔ nyimpa gyangyan akwasampafo bi paa ma wodzii n'ekyir."

column2: "Na osii mu kɔr n'egya fie wɔ Ofra
column3: na okokunkum no nuanom Jerubaal ne mbabanyin a wɔyɛ nyimpa eduosuon no
column4: wɔ ɔbo kor do: Jotam a ɔyɛ Jerubaal ne kaekyirba banyin no nko na ɔkae; osiandɛ ɔdze noho sumae."

column2: "Na Sekemmba nyinara
column3: na Millo fie nyinara poon hɔnho hyiae
column4: na wɔkɔree kɛhyɛɛ Abimelek hen wɔ dum a ɔwɔ Sekem no n'esudur no ho."

column2: "Na wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Jotam no
column3: ɔkɔree kegyinaa bepɔw Gerizim etsifi
column4: na ɔmaa ne ndze do tseaa mu see dɛ
column5: Sekem mbarimba

column2: "Aber bi ndua sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrekɛsera obi ngo ahyɛ no hɔn do hen; na wɔsee ngodua dɛ
column3: Dzi hɛn do hen."

column2: "Na ngodua no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana mingya me seradze a wɔnam mo do dze hyɛ Nyame na nyimpa enyimnyam no hɔ
column4: na minkedzi dua do akɔnaaba anaa?"

column2: "Na ndua no see adɔmbadua dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara bra
column4: na bedzi hɛn do hen."

column2: "Na adɔmbadua no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana mingya me dɛɛdɛw
column4: na m'aba pa no hɔ
column5: na minkedzi ndua do akɔnaaba?"

column2: "Na ndua no see wenyindua dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara bra
column4: na bedzi hɛn do hen."

column2: "Na wenyindua no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana mingya me nsa a ɔgye Nyame na nyimpa enyi no hɔ
column4: na minkedzi ndua do akɔnaaba?"

column2: "Nna ndua no nyinara see kɔkrɔnsoɛ dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara bra
column4: na bedzi hɛn do hen."

column2: "Na kɔkrɔnsoɛ no see ndua no dɛ
column3: Sɛ nokwar mu ara na hom resera me ngo ahyɛ me hom do hen a
column4: ɔno hom mbra mbɛhyɛ mo nwin ase: na sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a
column5: ogya mfi kɔkrɔnsoɛ mu mbɛmen Lebanon nkyindur no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: Sɛ hom ayɛ no nokwar mu tsenee
column4: dɛ hom ahyɛ Abimelek hen
column5: na sɛ hom nye Jerubaal na ne fie edzi no yie
column6: na dɛ mbrɛ ne nsaano edwuma regye na hom dze ayɛ no yi dze a

column2: "osiandɛ m'egya koe maa hom
column3: na ɔdze no nkwa kitsaa ne nsamu
column4: na ɔdze gyee hom fii Midian nsamu:"

column2: "naaso ndɛ hom asoɛr wɔ m'egya fie do
column3: na hom eku ne mbabanyin
column4: nyimpa eduosuon
column5: wɔ ɔbo kor do

column2: "Sɛ nokwar mu tsenee na hom nye Jerubaal na ɔnye ne fie edzi no ndɛ da yi a
column3: ɔno hom enyi ngye wɔ Abimelek ho
column4: na ɔno so n'enyi ngye wɔ hom ho:"

column2: "na sɛ ɔnntse dɛm dze a
column3: ogya mfi Abimelek mu mbra mbɛmen Sekem mbarimba no
column4: na Bɛt-Millo; na ogya mfi Sekemmba na Bɛt-Millo fie
column5: mbra mbɛmen Abimelek."

column2: "Na Jotan twee noho
column3: na oguanee kɔr Beer
column4: na ɔkɛtsenaa hɔ
column5: wɔ no nua Abimelek ho suro ntsi."

column2: "Na Abimelek yɛɛ hen wɔ Israel do mfe ebiasa."
"Na Nyankopɔn maa sunsum bɔn bi baa Abimelek na Sekemmba no ntamu; na Sekemmba no daadaa Abimelek:"
"ama etsirmɔdzendze a wɔdze yɛɛ Jerubaal ne mbabanyin eduosuon no aba
column3: na hɔn bɔgyaa ebua hɔn nua Abimelek a okum hɔn no
column4: na Sekem mbanyin a wɔhyɛɛ ne nsa dzen ma okum no nuanom no hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na Sekem mbanyin no kɔr no atsɛwee wɔ mbepɔw no etsifi
column3: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn a wɔbɛfaa hɔn nkyɛn wɔ ɔkwan no do nyinara epoo: na wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Abimelek."

column2: "Na Gaal
column3: Ebed ne babanyin no nye no nuanom bae
column4: na wosii mu kɔr Sekem: na Sekem mbarimba no dze hɔn werɛ hyɛɛ no mu."

column2: "Na wosii mu kɔr haban mu
column3: na wɔkɛtsetseew hɔn wenyin ture mu aba
column4: na wokyikyii wenyinamba no
column5: na wɔgyee hɔn enyi

column2: "Na Gaal
column3: Ebed ne babanyin no see dɛ
column4: Abimelek koraa nye woana
column5: na Sekem nye woana
column6: na yɛnsom no? Ana nnyɛ Jerubaal ba nye no bi
column7: na Zebul nye no hwɛdofo? Hom nsom Sekem n'egya Hamor ne mbarimba no: na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛbɔsom no?"

column2: "Ɔka mo nko a nkyɛ ɔman yi wɔ me nsamu
column3: nkyɛ meetu Abimelek wɔ do! Na ɔsee Abimelek dɛ
column4: Ma wo dɔm nyɛ kɛse na pue bra."

column2: "Na aber a Zebul
column3: kurow no do ɔhwɛfo no tsee Gaal
column4: Ebed ne babanyin no ne nsɛm no
column5: n'ebufuw dzɛwee."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa abɔfo nyansa kwan bi do ma wɔkɔr Abimelek nkyɛn dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: Gaal
column5: Ebed ne babanyin no na no nuanom aba Sekem
column8: wɔrehyɛ kurow no ma wɔaasoɛr wo do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: soɛr anadwe
column4: ɔwo na nkorɔfo a wɔka wo ho no
column5: na kɛtsɛw wɔ haban mu:"

column2: "na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: anapa
column4: iwi pue a
column5: soɛr ntsɛm
column8: sɛ ɔno na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no pue ba wo do a
column9: ɔno ayɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ ibenya n'ayɛyie no ara."

column2: "Na Abimelek
column3: na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho nyinara soɛɛr anadwe
column4: na wopaa hɔn mu ekuw anan kɛtsɛɛw Sekem."

column2: "Na Gaal
column3: Ebed ne babanyin no puei
column4: na okegyinaa kurow no n'abotsen ano: na Abimelek
column5: na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no soɛree fii atsɛwee hɔ."

column2: "Na aber a Gaal hun nkorɔfo no
column3: ɔsee Zebul dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: nkorɔfo bi na wofi mbepɔw no etsifi risian no. Na Zebul see no dɛ
column6: Mbepɔw no no sunsuma na ihu a wɔyɛ dɛ nyimpa no."

column2: "Na Gaal kaa bio dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: nkorɔfo bi nam asaase no fur mu risian ba
column5: na ikuw kor nam Meonenim osudur ho kwan no do reba."

column2: "Nna Zebul see no dɛ
column3: Afei w'ano a edze kaa dɛ
column4: Abimelek nye woana
column5: na yɛnsom no no ɔwɔ hen? Ana nnyɛ nkorɔfo a ibuu hɔn enyimtsia no nye yi? Me kyɛw ara nye yi

column2: "Na Gaal puei dzii Sekem mbarimba no enyim
column3: na ɔnye Abimelek kɔkoe."

column2: "Na Abimelek tsiiw no
column3: na ofii n'enyim guanee
column4: na epirafo pii hwehwee ase araa dze kodur kuropon no ano."

column2: "Na Abimelek tsenaa Aruma: na Zebul yii Gaal na no nuanom no edzi dɛ mma wɔnntsena Sekem."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no
column3: nkorɔfo no puei kɔr haban mu; na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Abimelek."

column2: "Na ɔfaa nkorɔfo no
column3: na obuee hɔn mu ekuw ebiasa na ɔkɛtsɛwee wɔ haban mu; na ohun dɛ nkorɔfo no rupue efi kurow no mu; na ɔsoɛɛr hɔn do
column4: na okunkum hɔn."

column2: "Na Abimelek na ekuwekuw a wɔka no ho no bɔɔ kyirdidi kɔr kan
column3: na wokegyinaa kurow no n'abotsen ano: na ekuw ebien no bɔɔ kyirdidi kɔr hɔn a wɔwɔ haban mu no nyinara do
column4: na wokunkum hɔn."

column2: "Na Abimelek nye kurow no koo da no nyinara; na ɔgyee kurow no
column3: na okum nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mu no: na ɔbɔɔ kurow no
column4: na ɔdze nkyen guguu do."

column2: "Na aber a mbarimba a wɔwɔ Sekem abantsentsen mu nyinara tsee no
column3: wɔkɛhɛɛn El-berit fie aban mu."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Abimelek dɛ Sekem abantsentsen mu mbarimba no nyinara aboa ano."
"Na Abimelek fowee kɔr bepɔw Zalmon do
column3: ɔnoara na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho nyinara; na Abimelek faa ekuma kitsaa ne nsamu
column4: na okotwaa dubaa wɔ ndua no do
column5: na ɔmaa do dze too no kɔn ho: na ɔsee nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no dɛ
column6: Dza hom ehu dɛ mayɛ yi
column7: hom nka homho na wɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ mayɛ yi."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo no nyinara twitwaa ndubaa dze dzii Abimelek ekyir
column3: na wɔdze boguu aban no ho
column4: na wɔsosɔɔ aban no ho gya dze guu hɔn do; ma Sekem abantsentsen no mu nyimpa nyinara so wuwui
column5: mbanyin na mbaa bɛyɛ apem."

column2: "Nna Abimelek sii mu kɔr Tebez
column3: ɔkɛkyeer Tebez do nsera
column4: na ɔgyee."

column2: "Na abantsentsen dzendzen bi wɔ kurow no mu
column3: na hɔ na mbaa na mbanyin nyinara
column4: na kurow no mu mba nyinara guanee kɔree
column5: na wɔtoow hɔnho mu
column6: na wɔfowee kɔr abantsentsen no n'etsifi."

column2: "Na Abimelek baa abantsentsen no ho
column3: na ɔnye no bɔkoe
column4: na opiin abantsentsen no n'abow ho papaapa dɛ ɔdze gya rekɛhyew no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa bi toow ewuyambo kuma bɔɔ Abimelek ne tsir
column3: na obuu ne tsidwerba."

column2: "Nna ɔtseaa mu frɛɛ aberantsɛ n'akodzesoanyi no ntsɛmara na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Twe w'afona
column4: na ku me
column5: na nkorɔfo aannka no wɔ mo ho dɛ
column6: Ɔbaa na okum no. Na n'aberantsɛ no dze afona wɔɔ no ma owui."

column2: "Na aber a Israel mbarimba no hun dɛ Abimelek ewu no
column3: hɔn nyinara sii mu kɔr hɔn ananmu."

column2: "Mbrɛ Nyankopɔn sii tuaa Abimelek ne ndzeyɛbɔn a ɔdze yɛɛ n'egya
column3: dɛ okunkum no nuanom eduosuon no kaw nye yi:"

column2: "na Sekemmba hɔn ndzeyɛbɔn nyinara Nyankopɔn maa ɔsanee bɔɔ hɔn etsifi: na Jerubaal babanyin Jotan no ndom no baa hɔn do."
